title: Starboard discloses 7.5% stake in Box Inc - Nasdaq.com
text: Sept 3 Reuters - U.S. hedge fund Starboard Value LP a 7.5% stake in cloud service provider Box Inc  on Tuesday, calling its shares "undervalued".
Box shares were up 7.1% $15.90 after the bell.
Starboard is now the second biggest stakeholder in the company, after Vanguard Group Inc, which has a 11.41% stake.
